verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hapo ndipo tulipomfurahia
Bwana Mungu wetu.
Hirizi na mizigo yote
viliposhindwa kusimama.
Shetani naye kivumbi
kakitimua kakimbia.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hapo ndipo tukasema
Mungu aitwe Mungu
hapo ndipo tukasema
Mungu apewe sifa
hapo ndipo tukasema
atawale Mungu milele. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tazama Bwana alipounyoosha
mkono wake mkuu.
Wachawi wote wakakoma,
mapepo na yakanyamaza.
Waganga na tunguri zao
kwa aibu wakaduwaa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana alipoinua mkono
hodari kwa wagonjwa.
Wakoma wakatakasika
viziwi wakasikia.
Viwete wakarukaruka
kwa furaha wamepona.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jicho la Bwana
lilipowaelekea watu waovu.
Hasira, chuki na majivuno
vyote vikatoweka.
Kiburi na maringo yao
hapo ndipo vikapotea.
